commands.command: osascript 'tell application "iTunes" to set shuffle of playlist "Wakeup" to false' osascript 'tell application "iTunes" to set shuffle of playlist "Wakeup" to true' play playlist "Wakeup" bye
osascript 'tell application "iTunes" to set shuffle of playlist "Knockout" to false' osascript 'tell application "iTunes" to set shuffle of playlist "Knockout" to true' play playlist "Knockout" bye
